content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to future product release information. However, the tech industry is constantly evolving and innovative new products have been released in the past that have shifted the way we use and perceive smartphones such as the first iPhone, Samsung Galaxy Edge, and foldable phones. It is possible that there could be upcoming mobile devices that could create a paradigm shift in the way we use or perceive smartphones, but it remains to be seen what those devices might be.
